Room.Name: Delegation Way/Hofton Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Hofton Avenue and Delegation Way.
Room.LongDescription: Delegation Way runs south from Hofton Avenue, which runs to the east and west, parallel to the northern City Walls. On the southeast corner of the intersection, you can see the Embassy Court, housing the Elven and Dwarven Embassies. On the southwest, you can see the Hofton Ziggurat, which is the primary location for political delegations to meet and discuss problems.
